build.lib.AFS.feature_selector module

class Feature_Selector(data_pd, dataset_name, r_path='/usr/local/bin/Rscript')[source]

Bases: object

Feature selection with the MxM R package Author: kbiza@csd.uoc.gr, droubo@csd.uoc.gr

fbed(target_name, config, train_idx_name=None)[source]

Runs the FBED feature selection algorithm using the MxM R package Parameters ———-

target_name (str) : the name of the target config (dictionary) : the predictive configuration train_idx_name (str) : the name of the csv file with the train indexes for a specific fold

selected_features (list): the indexes of the selected features

ses(target_name, config, train_idx_name=None)[source]

Runs the SES feature selection algorithm using the MxM R package Parameters ———-

target_name (str) : the name of the target config (dictionary) : the predictive configuration train_idx_name (str) : the name of the csv file with the train indexes for a specific fold

selected_features (list): the indexes of the selected features

feature_selection(config, target_name, train_idx_name=None)[source]

Feature selection Parameters ———-

config (dictionary) : the predictive configuration target_name (str) : the name of the target train_idx_name (str) : the name of the csv file with the train indexes for a specific fold

features (list): the indexes of the selected features

build.lib.AFS.oos module

class OOS[source]

Bases: object

Out-of-sample protocols for data splitting Author: kbiza@csd.uoc.gr, droubo@csd.uoc.gr

data_split(oos_protocol, X, y=None, target_type='continuous')[source]

oos_protocol(dictionary) : information about the out-of-sample protocol X (pandas or numpy array) : the feature data, if y==None, X contains all samples y (pandas or numpy array) : the target vector in case of categorical target (for stratified kfold) target_type (str) : continuous or categorical

train_inds (list of lists) : the train indexes test_inds(list of lists) : the test indexes

Reads the available predictive learning, feature selection, and preprocessing algorithms from json files and creates the predictive configurations Author : kbiza@csd.uoc.gr
